description: Whether you're after a light lunch or side dish, give this caramelised haloumi salad recipe a try. It's bursting with fresh, juicy tomatoes.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Halal,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg free
name: Tomato & Caramelised Haloumi Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 gourmet tomatoes, cut into thick wedges
1 small red onion, halved, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place tomato, onion and zucchini in a large bowl. Season and toss to combine. Set aside.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook haloumi for 1 minute each side or until golden. Add honey, chilli and sesame seeds. Cook for 4 minutes or until haloumi caramelises. Stir in zest and juice and remove pan from heat.
Add haloumi mixture and mint to tomato mixture. Toss gently to combine. Serve.
